title.rendered: Akuvox R20K SIP Video Door Phone with Numeric Keypad

excerpt.rendered:
Akuvox R20K SIP video door phone with first class audio and video quality, 116° wide angle, 2 Mega pixels camera with automatic illumination, Supports 13.56 MHz and 125 kHz access card, Ideal for environments with limited space

  • Full metal Aluminum vandal resistant body
  • 2 MP 120° Wide-angle camera (Video resolution max.: 1280x720p – 30fps)
  • Supports Video Preview and Visitor Snapshot to email
  • PoE (IEEE802.3af, Power-over-Ethernet)
  • High intensity LEDs for night viewing
  • 13.56 MHz RFID Card Reader
  • Keypad supports pincode for keyless entry
  • IP 65 water and dust resistance rating – ideal for Australian Conditions
  • 2 x Integrated door lock control relays
  • Two-way audio communication over IP networks with Echo Cancel feature
  • Complies with SIP standard for easy integration with SIP based PBX Systems
  • Supports visitor snapshot to email
  • Supports ONVIF standard for easy integration with NVR
